job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtOur client is the next big thing Theyre in stealth mode backed by two householdname billionaires and focused on the war on cancerltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtYou will work with a team of machine learning scientists and engineers to develop and deploy AIbased biomarkers to support the personalization of cancer therapy You will work closely with our engineering team to build productiongrade APIs and serving models that integrate with our clinical productltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtMinimum Qualifications ltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBS or MS in an AIrelated field CS EE Stats etc or substantial development experience in AIltligtltligtStrong programming skills competitive in ACMICPC or other competitionsltligtltligtSubstantial experience with Python and deep learning libraries such as PyTorch or TensorflowltligtltligtExperience in implementing highperformance and largescale deep learning systems ltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtPreferred QualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtFull time industry experience in deep learning researchproductltligtltligtExperience mentoring and advising other engineersltligtltulgt
